name: h5-video-embed-monorepo
description: H5 视频嵌入组件的 monorepo 项目

scripts.dev:npm: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:demo
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:demo
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/server && npm install && cd ../demo-app && npm install && cd ../h5-video-embed && npm install
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules dist build
